items.sentence: Tom is still waiting for permission to do that.
I trusted somebody who didn't deserve my trust.
Tom doesn't walk to school with the other kids.
Tom and Mary are on the porch, drinking coffee.
I really hope that you didn't drink that water.
This undermined my trust in state institutions.
I've never eaten this kind of ice cream before.
Tom accepted the invitation without hesitation.
You actually tried to do that once, didn't you?
Would it be all right if I don't do that today?
